api_list.name: Get Stock Metadata
Get Stock Price (Bulk)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-stocks1.p.rapidapi.com/api/stock/price"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-stocks1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Stock Price (Single)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-stocks1.p.rapidapi.com/api/stock/price/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-stocks1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Stock Price (Bulk)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-stocks1.p.rapidapi.com/api/stock/price"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-stocks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-stocks1.p.rapidapi.com/api/stock/price"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-stocks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
